div.p: Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio secundo die marcij anno quo supra

Eodem die georgius Dys' fatebatur se deben' Johanni Colison xl s'
quam summam ballivi constituerunt eundem georgium persoluere infra terminum
Juris

Eodem die thomas quhit fatebatur se deben' georgio Dys' liiij s'
soluend' ad festum pasche proxime futurum quamquid summam dictus
georgius assignauit Johanni Colisone pro debito suo

the samyn day alexander of mar comperit with Wille crage his seruande and
with his witnes offering thame redy to vndirly the law anent the
strubulance betuix the saide William and patrik andirson'

The samyn day Williame of gareache eldar falyeit in his preif anent
the fraucht of tua barrelis clamit fra Williame Wormet and the said Wilyeam
quyt of his challance

The saide day alexander red one that ane part and thomas mar' with his
forspekar mastir Androw cadiow one that vthir ar' oblist be the
fathtis of thar bodiis that thai sal stande at the deliuerance
of ane suorne assis' vnsuspek this day xv dais anent
the borghe' strekit apon' the said thomas be the said alexander
for the refundin' to him of the availe of ane serplar of woll
as is contenit in the akis maide obefor as day of peremptour
but ony excepcion' dilatour cauillacion fraud or gile to be
proponit be ony of the saide partiis

the samyn day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to thome
of mar to ansuer to thomas quhit as law wile tueching the
clame of ane pipe of wade

The samyn day it was fundyne ande deliuerit be ane suorne assis'
be the moutht of thomas fyf forspekar that anent the debate of the
fraucht of the hulk betuix the merchandis ande avnaris that the merchandis
sal resaue thar gudis that was ladyne in the said schipe quhilkis sal
be sett quhat is ane sak quhat half ane sek quhat les' or quhat
mair Ande thai sal set Souerte to the avnaris to ansuer for alsmekle' fraucht
as the avnaris may optene of thame be the wattir law in the feire or the moy
ande to be pait as the schipe was frauchit ande as the money yeyde in the
tyme scho was frauchit vpone the quhilkis Robert blinsele askit Instrument
vndir the Secret Sele befor thir witnes alexander menyeis alexander chamer yongar
thomas prat James of leslie Richerd Waus and vthir diuers'

The saide day Jonhne colisone lauchfullie warnit callit and comperit to ansuer'
tile ane borghe strekit apone him be Williame blinsele for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of ane letter vndir his Sele concerning his landis of angelwele and ij lange
riggis eftir the tenor of the saide borghe allegit that the saide landis was his fee
ande heretage ande the saide letter was his chartir ande warandice of the samyn
landis tharfor he aucht nocht to ansuer to the said borghe allegeand' that the aldirman
ande the balyeis was nay Juge to his fee and heretage but ane preceptor of
our Souerane lordis quhilkis partiis being remouit the Court riplie and
wele auisit ordande the saide Jonhne to schew his possessione of the said
landis And thareftir the saide Jonhne' schew his chartir ande preuit his posse
ssion' Ande the aldirman and balyeis procedit nay forthir in the said matir
ande referit it to the law befor the Juge quhome it efferis
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio quinto die marcij Anno quosupra

the samyne day it was fundin ande deliuerit be ane suorne assis' alexander
chamer forspekar that Jonhne Duncansone of banf sal fre and releyfe
mastir Dauid mathesone of ane barrele of Salmond follouit be mastir
Androu cadiow procuratour to Walter ogiluy of auchlevyne And thareftir
thomas Jamesone seriande to remane within the tolbutht quhile he fande
Souerte to freithe the saide Dauid of the said barrele of Salmond and
of al skathis that happinnis the saide Dauid to sustene tharthrow

the saide day it was fundin ande sufficientlie preuit that Androu lammyntone
ande Jonhne of lamyntone sal freithe releyf ande keipe thome Wodman
skathles anent xxxiij peter of woll ande xvi s' of Siluer for the quhilkis
the saide thomas come Souerte to Androw murray for thame in the
nayme of cowy Jonhnesone the quhilk covy Jonhnson was oblist be the fatht
of his body to keipe the saidis Jhon' and Androw skathles tharanent and to pay the saidis
woll and siluer

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Johannes litstar est filius
et heres legittimus quondam thome litstar qui peciit balliuum secum exire
ad cognoscendum ipsum ad terras sibi Jure hereditario contingen'

Eodem die Johannes litstar filius et heres quondam thome litstar elegit fecit
creauit constituit et ordinauit Johannem thomsone suum legittimum Curatum se et
suas terras ac bona quecumque sibi pertinentes ad regendum custodiendum ac
defendendum pro vtilitate sua dummodo annj Curat' de Jure elapsi
fuerunt quiquid' Curatus inuenit Willelmum tulidef plegium ac fide
iussorem pro eo ad regendum dictum puerum et terras ac bona sua
pro suo comodo duran' dictis terminis ut decet per ostensione manus
sue dextre omnibus fraude et dolo semotis

the saide day Williame tulidef mastir Richerde craufurde Jonhne moire
ande Robert of crage was chosin arbitouris ande amicable' compositouris
and androu culane eldar ourman suorne anent ale comptis rekningis
and debatis clamis ande controuersiis debatabile betuix James colison
one that ane part Ande androu culane yongar one that vthir part to the
day of the making of this ak ande the saide partiis oblist and suorne
to abid and stand at thar deliuerance And thai to deliuer decret and
giffurtht thar finale sentence and decret tharanent betuix this and sonday
next eftir follouing or the sone gaing to of that Ilk

The samyne day Williame goldsmitht become sourte be his hande
to the ballieis to entir Jonhne Duncanson' of banf within the tolbutht
within xv dais or ellis to pay the barrele of Salmonde and freithe and
releyf Dauid matheson' tharanent follouit be the procuratouris of Walter ogiluy
eftir the tenor of the ak maide obefor tharapone

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xij die marcij Anno
quo supra

the saide day James Jofray lauchfullie callit and nocht compe
rit lauchfullie tyme of day cumyne to follou the borghe' strekit apone
Dauid foxe for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of xl s' with the mair'
quharfor the said Dauid fande ane borghe' in the handis of philp of
Dunbrek officiar' that he is quyt of his challance quhile he be fastnit
with new soit and protestit for his costis and skathis And philp Dunbrek
officiar at commavnd of the balyeis arrestit ale Somes aucht be the
saide Dauid to the saide James in the handis of the saide Dauid at the
challance of the aldirman for certane somez aucht to him

Eodem die magnus Wormet fecit constituit et ordinauit Robertum blinsele
et magistrum andream cadiow suos procuratores coniunctim et diuisim ad petendum et
recipiendum ab alexandro chamer xviij s' sibi debit' Ac in omnibus aliis causis querelis
et actionibus ipsum concernentibus et de receptis acquitand' prosequend' et defendend'
promitten' de rato et Rato grato in vberiore forma procuratorij et cetera

the samyne day Williame bynne grantit to pay to marione of forbutht
ix elne of warpit clatht within terme of law
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvto die marcij Anno quosupra

The quhilk day Williame gareache eldar grantit to the aldirman ande
balyeis to supersede the l' s' aucht to him be Androu branche for vi dais
ande thai to caus' him be pait of the saide money the Sex dais being runnyn
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xvio die marcij Anno quosupra

the samyne day Wilyeame Wormet grantit him pait be the handis of Jonhne Wat
sone of xiij flemis noblis ande ane half for certane skinnis as is contenit in the
ak maide obefor of the quhilkis he quiet'clamit the saide Jonhne now and foreuire

the samyne day alexander menyeis Jonhne colisone Androw murray eldar Walter auch
neyf Jonhne of Culane Robert of buchane Robert of crage Androw branche
Alexander gray Dauid prat Androu Wentone Androw culane yongar mastir Richert
craufurde Jonhne grige Williame gareache eldar Williame andirson' ande
William tulidef was chosin ande suorne in ane assise to determe and decide
the borghe' strekit apone thomas mare be alexander rede anent the pament
of ane serplat of woll with the quhilkis the said thomas wranguislie Intromettit
And' the saide assis' was dischargit of thar aithis And batht the forsaide
partiis was oblist be the fathtis of thar bodiis thar handis vphaldyne
to stande ande abide at thar deliuerance In presens of the aldirman ande balyeis
quhilkis deliuerit ande decretit be the moutht of Jonhne colison talisman
that thomas mar' sal deliuer or ger be deliuerit to the saide alexander rede
ane serplat of woll in the feire contening alsmony wanis ande nalys of wecht
as the serplat of woll that was the said alexander redis weit quhilk was
sauld' be the said thomas and patrick rede to cayfer portar of brugis
within xv dais eftir the erast schip salande out of the port of abirdene
with merchandis cumand' to zelande or flandris Ande for the deliuerance of
the saide serplat of woll ande of the saide wecht and gudnes the forsaide
thomas sal sett sikir caucion ande Souerte to the saide alexander within the tone
of abirdene withtin foure dais hereftir Ande the siluer of the saide serplat that
was sauld' being in cayferis hande sal redunde to the profit of the saide
thomas mare And gyf ony siluer be takin vpe be alexander rede or be
ony vthiris in his name of the serplat that was sauld restand in cayferis
handis it salbe pait agan to the saide thomas mare Ande for the aven
toure of half the siluer of the serplat of woll quhilk sulde be deliuerit
to alexander rede the saide assis' Ilkan be thar name ar oblist to
beire tene s' gret of aventoure of it in the hayuine cumyne fra flandris
to Scotlande in the schip callit the barbara of abirdene at the wile
of the saide Alexander Rede

Curia balliuroum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem
xixo die marcij Anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo ixo

The quhilk day it was deliuerit be ane assis' alexander rede talisman
that Dauid mathesone suld' gif compt and rekning to murthow glenmaluing
of the fraucht of the berbara of this last rays' out of flandris Ande
atour thai ordanit the said Dauid to avys' with his aith quhil to morne
ande se Ilkane poynt contenit in the said murthoys byle of rekning
gevin to him And quhat the saide Dauid wile suer is pait tharof he
salbe quyt And' quhat he refus' the said murthow sal sueyre
he is vnpait tharof quhilk the said Dauid sal pay

expan.note: The marginal heading is repeated on page 175.

div.p:
the saide day it was deliuerit be ane assis' alexander red talisman that
Jonhne of culan sal persew the merchandis be the law avand' fraucht
of the schip callit berbara cummand out of fraunce for the fraucht
that restis vnpait as law will and quhat he gettis tharof to mak compt
Rekning ande payment to Dauid matheson' and the saide Jonhne sal do
his diligence to the persering of the saide fraucht

Eodem die matheus culane fecit constuit constituit creauit et ordinauit Andream Culan
suum fratrem germanum suum legittimum assignatum procuratorem et cessionarem Irreuocabilem
ad intrandum per sasinam et possessionem in tenemento sibi Jure hereditario contin
gen' Jacen' in vico furcarum ac in quodam crofto Jacente infra territorium croftorum
de Rubislaw ac ad petendum requirendum et acceptandum omnia bona sibi Jure
hereditario pertinen' Et inde acquitand' Et si necesse fuerit prosequend' agend'
et defendend' promitten' de Rato et grato et cetera cum omnibus aliis clausulis
necessariis et oportunis

The saide day Androu Waus falyet in his preyf anent sex s' clamit be
him aucht be megy cumynge quhilk he tuk to preif
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio vicesimo die marcij Anno quosupra

the samyn day comperit Jonhne of Culane ande gert warne thomas prat
alexander chamer alexander menyeis and diuers' vthiris avand' fraucht to him ande dide his
diligence to haue Justice of thame Ande the ballieis was redy to do
Justice Ande gert Row ane assis' with avys' of the partyis ande chargit thome
Jamesone seriande to warne the saide assis' to comper befor thame one mo
nunday that next cumis

The saide day comperit Dauid mathesone In presens of the balyeis ande murthow
glenmaluynge ande deponit the gret aithe that he dide has pait lelely
ande treulie to the saide murtho ale thingis contenit in his bill of rekning
excep sevin pryme spakis And the saide Dauid quyt of his challance tharanent
eftir the tenor of the ak made obefor

the samyn day the balyeis continevit for waknes of the court the borghe'
strekit be Dauid mathesone apone Jonhne of Culane of the wranguis'
haldin fra him of tua li' g' quhil the next monunday
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo secundo die marcij anno quo et cetera

the saide day Androw Waus in Amerciament of the court of the wranguis' borghe'
strekin' vpone megy cuming for the wranguis' halding fra him of Sex
s' Ande the saide mergaret quyt of his challance

Eodem die Willekin de feire et Egydius filius suus quibus ipsorum in
amerciamento Curie pro in
proturbio perturbio Roberti culan Et Idem Robertus amerciatur
pro perturbio dictorum Willekin et filij suj Insuper dicte partes fide
media promisserunt ad standum in concordia in futurum Et si aliquis ipsorum
iniuriam alteri de cetero intulerit hic aut in aliis partibus et conuictus
fuerit soluet ad edificacionem Beati nicholaij centum s'

Eodem die thomas mar inuenit Robertum blinsele caucionarium et
plegium alexandro rede pro deliberacione vnius serplarij lane in opido
de feire secundum si aut sue factoribus tenorem acti prius desuper confecti et Idem thomas obligatur
fide media ad conseruandum eiusdem Robertum Indempnem inde per terras et bona sua
Item eodem die alexander rede inuenit thomam prat plegium et caucio
narium prefato thome mar pro solucione peccunie si que recepta
fuitut per dictum alexandrum aut aliquem nomine ipsius de serplario lane vendit'
cayfer opidano de brugis secundum tenorem acti prius desuper confect' et Idem
alexander rede obligatur fide media ad conseruandum prefatum thomam inde
Indempnem per terras et bona sua

the samyn day Jonhne fechat was in Amerciament of the court for the wrang
uys' bringing of the wrak of the hulk to the key in skath of the
tovne And thomas prat sale tak tua leilmene vnsuspek ande
thai sal be thar aithis consider the skath done to him and his keile
throu the said wrake And in likuis' the skath done to the said Jonhne
be the saide thomas and Ilkane tile vpricht til vthir

The said day William gregory grantit him avand to thomas Waus
of his ayrschip ane covntour' burd j fethirbede j pot a pane a quarte
j poynt j dische ane dublaire ane bassyne and ane lawayr the
quhilkis he oblist him be the fatht of his bodie to deliuer in continent
but ony delay

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' mastir Androw cadiow
talysmane that thomas prat sal pay to Jonhne of culane ande Dauid matheson
his haile fraucht of the gudis he hed in the barbara that is viij crovnis for the
moy of quhet eftir the tenour of the chartir party the saidis Jonhne and Dauid
fyndand caucion to the saide thomas that samekile as he cane preyf that
the moy of quhet is in the place or port quhar the said schip ladit
ande resauit the quhet salbe furthtcumand' to the said thomas and rebatit
in his fraucht And the said thomas has done wrange in the halding of
his fraucht

the said day the borghe' strekit apone murthow glenmaluing ande Jonhne of
cullane be Dauid mathesone for the wranguys' haldinge fra him of tua li'
gretis was funding of nane availe becaus' he hed nocht gevin compt
ande rekning to the saide murthow

Eodem die Johannes culane inuenit Willelmum goldsmitht plegium legalem
quod Dauid mathesone erit Indempnis pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris
et idem Johannes obligatur per manum suam ad conseruandum prefatum Willelmum
indempnem de huiusmodi fideiussione Insuper dictus Dauid inuenit Alexandrum trale
plegium legalem quod prefatus Johannes erit Indempnis pro eo aliter quam per
viam Juris et Idem Dauid obligatur per manum suam ad conseruandum dictum alexandrum
inde Indempnem

The saide say it was sufficientlie previt that Androw lousone has
pait to Dauid mar xvj s' and ij d' Ande the saide Dauid has tane apon'
him to freithe the saide Androw of vj s' and x d' for William leis
of xxiiij s' clamit for ane hous' maile

The saide day Duncan straloche seriand at the commavnd of the balyeis chargit
be his wand alexander of mar to remane within the tolbutht quhile he pait
the maile of ane half nethis fischingis of the mydchingile optenit one
him be alexander of chamer

the saide day alexander of mar offerit him redy tile vndirly ane suorne
assis' vnsuspect of his nichtburis anent the maile of half ane nethis
fischingis of the midchingile quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay to
alexander of chamer

div.head: Anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo
div.p:
In the balye court of abirdene haldin the xxviij day of marche forsaide
Alexander chamer of murchile Jonhne colisone and alexander chamer his sone Ilkan
of thame come dettouris be the fathis of thar bodiis to mastir Androw
Cadiow for tua barrelis of Salmond to be pait at the next lammes
of the richtuys bynd of abirdene And falyeing' in pament
of Salmond' to pay alsmekle' siluer as salmond' gevis in Abirdene

the samyne day In presens of the aldirman ande balyeis alexander of mare
opinly grantit ande schew that he hed' resignit ale his landis
ande gudis liand' within the saide burghe In the handis of Jonhne
menyeis ane of the balyeis of the samyn to make pament of the
maile of half ane nethis fischingis of midcinhillmidchingill optenit apon
him be alexander chamyr of murchile

the said day mastir Androw cadiow was quyt be ane assis alexander
Rede talisman of the maile of demi nethis fischingis of the midchin
gile follouit be alexander of mare

Eodem die Dauid mathesone deuenit plegius legalis quod alexander mar erit
Indempnis pro alexandro chamer de murchile et parte sua aliter quam per viam
iuris Et Andreas Culane Junior deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus
alexander chamer erit Indempnis pro prefato alexandro mar et parte sua
aliter quam per viam Juris et qualibet huiusmodi parcium obligatur ad conseruandum
plegios suos Indempnes de premissis fideiussionibus

In the bailye court of abirdene haldin the pennult day of marche
the yer of gode jM iiijc and nyntj yeris thomas Jamesone officiare
at commavnd of the balyeis chargit be his wande William gregory
to remane within the tolbutht quhile he pait his vnlaw and fulfillit
the ak maid obefor to thomas Waus and pay the gudis contenit in the samyn

Eodem die comparuit Isabella cheyne sponsa Johannis andirsone comparuit
coram Andrea culane vno balliuorum in pretorio protribunali sedente et
motu proprio ac sua pura et spontanea voluntate non vi aut metu
duct' ut asseruit consensit et expresse assensit vendicionj et alie
nacionj vnius annuj redditus viginti duorum solidorum fact' per dictum
coniugem suum curato et capellanis collegij ecclesie parrochialis de abirdene annua
tim leuand' et exeuntis de tota terra sua tam anteriore quam interiore
Jacente in le chakaraw inter terram altaris Sancti sebestiani
ex orientali et terram quondam gilberti muresone ex occidentali partibus altera
et terram domini de many verus austrum et communionem viam regiam versus
boriam quamquidam vendicionem dicta Isabella nunquam in viduitate aut
extra reuocaret clam vel palam sub penis periurij infamieque ac sub
pena centum li' monete scocie fabrice ecclesie de abirdene soluend'
Ad que omnia et singula premissa magnum corporale prestitit Jura
cum expressatis Sacrosanctis die ewangeliis Testibus alexandro rede An
drea branche Andrea lammyntone thoma gledstane Roberto
huchonsone philippo Dunbrek et thoma Jamesone seriandis

Eodem die dominus Dauid Waus curatus de abirdene in medio produxit
quoddam Instrumentum manuali subscripcione domini Johannis stirueling notarij publici sub
Sigillo thome fyf ballivi de et super introitu et sasina Johannis andirsone
in quadam terra tam anteriore quam interiore Jacente in le chakirraw inter terram
altaris Sancti sebestianj ex orientali et terram quondam gilberti mureson ex occidentali

Tercio die Aprilis Anno Domini et cetera oct Nonagesimo In presencia honorabili viri Andree
culane vnius balliuorum de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem protribunali sedentis
comparuit Andreas andirsone frater germanus Johannis andirsone filij et
heredis quondam Johannis andree et se fatebatur deben' dicto Johanni summam
centum et sexaginta mercarum vsualis monete scocie sibi in sua necessitate
accomodat' soluend' ad festa pentecostes et Sancti martinj in yeme
proxime inde sequente secundum tenorem cuiusdam littere obligacionis per dictum
andream facte et deliberate prefato Johanni fratri suo ibidem producte et perlecte
sane integre non rase nec in aliqua sui parte vicinitate sub Sigillis
Villelmi blinsele et Johannis Kintor sigillat' et cetera quamquidam summam idem
Andreas fide media persoluere promisit Testibus alexandro chamer filio Willelmo
Wormet thoma chamer scissor patricio andirson' et philippo de Dunbrek
